name: 0.25 mm GRO+ Advanced Scalp Dermaroller
about: What it is: A dermatologist-codeveloped Dermaroller that gently exfoliates the scalp...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Thinning.- Flaky, Dry Scalp..Key Benefits: - Lightly exfoliates the scalp.- Wide head offers maximum coverage.- Monthly Replacement Heads available..What Else You Need to Know: This luxe Dermaroller gently exfoliates the scalp to prepare for Vegamouru2019s GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum (sold separately). The scalp tool, codeveloped by dermatologists, features a wide head specifically designed for maximum scalp coverage. The easy twist-on, twist-off design works in tandem with monthly Replacement Heads, and it comes complete with its own protective carry case. For best results, replace the Dermaroller head every 30 days..
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Sanitize before use with an alcohol-based sanitizer. .-Hold wet or dry hair down tightly against the scalp. .-Using gentle, even pressure, roll five times horizontally and five times vertically across the scalp in sections, focusing on areas of concern..-Sanitize after use..-Allow the Dermaroller to dry. .-Replace the Dermaroller Head monthly.

reviews.review_title: Make sure youu2019re getting the ENTIRE dermaroller
Hair breakage - go for a derma stamp instead
reviews.review_text: The product itself is fine as a dermaroller, however if you are using this for your scalp and donu2019t have extremely short hair I would advise to buy a derma stamp instead. No matter what I did (holding down my hair, not rolling back and forth) this would still get caught on and rip and break my hair, which was counterproductive to wanting my hair to grow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its good it looks luxurious when opened i love this

reviews.review_title: Not actually a full dermaroller (app users)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you order from the app, which I stupidly did since I didn't realize that Sephora only provides full product details on their web version and not their app, then you should know that the app doesn't show that this is just the head of the dermaroller, not the fuller dermaroller itself. The app makes it seem like you will be getting the full dermaroller (and I have the screenshots to prove it before anyone tries to call me a liar). I'd love to contact Sephora about it, but their live chat option isn't actually ever available, and I only check it during times that it is supposed to be active. I don't know why they lie about having a live chat option when they actually don't. I can't call them currently due to issues with my phone. Last I will be ordering from Sephora. It is wild that it is 2024 and they still don't have their app configured correctly so that you get the correct item information from it. So embarrassing for such a big company. What a shady company.

I recently had the chance to try Vegamor's new GRO+ advanced dermaroller and I started using it about 10 days ago. I have sensitive scalp and it does not irritate my scalp after use. I love how beginner friendly it is and I can exfoliate my scalp right at home

reviews.review_title: This has my scalp feeling revitalized!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the chsnce to try out Vegamour's GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller, and I am loving this thing! It gently exfoliates my scalp while allowing easier absorption of serums. Myscalp feels so much healthier now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this tool lightly exfoliates my scalp, without irritating it. I do have a bit of sensitive scalp, but this has definitely helped me so far. I feel like my products afterwards are able to deeply penetrate into my scalp better. I will absolutely continue to use and hope to see great results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this dermatoller! The Vegamour hair roller is a must-have for adding volume and smooth curls. Itu2019s gentle, easy to use, and gives a natural lift that lasts all day. Perfect for fine to thick hair typesu2014highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am currently obsessed with this Dermaroller from GRO+! It makes such a huge difference in how my sculp feels. It gently exfoliates the sculp and helps with the blood flow. I use it with my GRO+ serum and I see improvements in my hair line already after a few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve enjoyed this roller. I havenu2019t had it long enough to notice hair growth effects yet, but I do feel that it helps as it penetrates the scalp when I gently massage my head with it. Iu2019m going to continue using this product to see a noticeable difference with my hair growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love dermarolling for the scalp and this roller is excellent for that! Itu2019s very good quality and the head is big enough for quick and easy use. I use it with the Vegampur serum and so far Iu2019m happy with the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This innovative scalp tool is a total game changer! It's gentle exfoliates the scalp without irritations.  My husband enjoys using this too, so I've ordered another refil. It's super easy to use and it feels so soothing. Highly recommended this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this dermaroller and it is super great so far. very gentle to the scalp, does not hurt. it exfoliates my scalp within seconds. comes in great packaging, perfect for on the go. excited for it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great because a healthy scalp is great for hair growth. I think the biggest and most underrated problem with hair loss is the lack of a healthy scalp. I trust this brand and I wouldnu2019t purchase a derma roller from any other brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging- it comes it a beautiful case! The removable head makes it easy to replace, which is really nice! Iu2019ve only used it a few times, but itu2019s simple to use and seems effective so far! Iu2019m excited to keep using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little hesitant at first about using a dermaroller but his one is so gentle on my scalp and makes a big difference in applying my Vegamour hair growth serum. It helps the product work more efficiently to help with my thinning hair. I also love how sleek and high end this dermaroller looks and feels, definitely high quality. And it comes with a beautiful case to store an travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Vegamour Dermaroller for my scalp, and itu2019s been a game changer! The roller is easy to use and doesnu2019t feel harsh on my skin at all. After just a few weeks of consistent use, I noticed my hair started to look and feel healthier, with some new growth appearing. It works perfectly alongside my scalp serum, helping it absorb better and making my hair care routine more effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this dermaroller! Itu2019s doesnu2019t hurt! Feels really nice on the scalp and relaxing before bed! Really see a difference on my new hair coming out! Will definitely continue to use it! And I use their whole line for regrowing hair! Amazing stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Gro+ Advanced Dermaroller, and Iu2019m already noticing a difference! The micro-needles are gentle but effective, and I can tell my hair care products are absorbing better after each use. Itu2019s easy to handle and has become a great addition to my routine. Excited to see even more long-term benefits!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving using this. I thought it would hurt when I use it. But it doesn't hurt at all. I love using it once a week. I use it and then apply my hair tonic to stimulate growth even more. I love the case it comes with to store it. It's easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Vegamour GRO Hair Serum and noticed some positive changes with growth and less thinning, so I decided to take it up a notch and try the GRO Advanced Scalp Dermaroller. Honestly, I was a bit hesitant about microneedling, but Iu2019ve been pleasantly surprised so far!  The roller itself is well made and easy to use. It doesnu2019t hurt, Iu2019d call it a mild discomfort especially around the temple area, but nothing intolerable. As for results, itu2019s still too early to say since Iu2019ve only just started. Iu2019ll definitely keep using it and update in a few months to see how it pairs with the serum long term.  If youu2019re already using the Vegamour serum and considering this as an extra step, it seems promising so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The NEW! GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller is a fantastic tool for anyone looking to improve scalp health and promote hair growth. Its fine needles are designed to gently stimulate the scalp, increasing blood flow and enhancing the absorption of hair growth products. After using it consistently, I noticed a subtle difference in hair thickness and overall scalp vitality. The design is ergonomic and easy to use, making the dermarolling process simple and comfortable. Itu2019s a great addition to any hair care routine, particularly for those struggling with thinning hair or looking to boost the effectiveness of their hair treatments.

I have naturally thin hair and get frustrated seeing how much Iu2019m losing every single day so I was super excited to try an innovative product like this one. Iu2019ve been using the Vegamour hair serum for a while so itu2019s been a no-brainer pairing it with the roller. I havenu2019t seen any major results yet, but Iu2019m optimistic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little scared and skeptical at first since Iu2019ve heard of dermarolling on the face but not the scalp. Itu2019s really gentle and an easy to use tool and with consistent use Iu2019m starting to notice a difference in my hair!

reviews.review_title: Two Week Review of this Product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: u201cI recieved this in exchange for this postu201d I have been using this product for two weeks now and so far I have noticied a slight difference with my hair. I have fine, wavy hair and some spots have been shedding a lot of hair and I have difficulty grow some parts out and do notice that those parts look fuller. I will continue using this product to see if I have any more results but so far this appears to be a good product.

reviews.review_title: The best thing Iu2019ve ever had! Definitely must-have
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Vegamour GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller is designed to enhance hair wellness routines. With ultra-fine titanium needles, it gently stimulates the scalp, boosting absorption of serums and promoting thicker, fuller hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with fine hair and experiencing hair loss, Iu2019m excited to find a solution like this. The micro-needling technology is designed to promote a healthy scalp, reduce shedding, and encourage hair growth. After using it for a week, the first application was a bit uncomfortable, but it quickly became manageable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this product from Vegamour and have been loving it so much lately. Itu2019s perfect to use on a Sunday night and I love using this as a part of my haircare routine. I love it! Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This dermaroller has instantly changed my hair texture! Since being pregnant my hair has been so thin and Iu2019ve been struggling to grow my hair back. I use this almost every night, the blades are very easy to use and donu2019t hurt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It feels very soothing and doesnu2019t hurt or feel uncomfortable at all. I havenu2019t been using it long enough so Iu2019m waiting for it to start working but itu2019s cute and the quality also feels reallyy great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This dermaroller is beautiful and feels so luxurious! It came in a very nice case as well, although I did find it difficult to open. This roller seems to be wider than others I have seen. It is slightly painful at first, but this gets better with continued use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little scared to use it at first since I had never used a Dermaroller. I have to say I was impressed by how easy and painless this was! I can tell that it was all made with high quality material and I am super excited to see the long term results.

reviews.review_title: Add this to your nightly routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this beautiful product by Vegamour and Skeepers. Letu2019s start with the box and how beautiful it is. Then you open it and the roller is absolutely gorgeous. I been using it every night for like 10-15 minutes before bed and Iu2019m loving the results I see.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it comes with a carry case so I can keep my roller clean whenever Iu2019m not using it! It gently exfoliates at home which I enjoy because I donu2019t have to pay to get a treatment done. Itu2019s definitely making a difference in the growth of my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the GRO scalp dermaroller from Vegamour, and this is a such a great additiona to my hair routine. It exfoliates the scalp making the serum to go directly to the follicles and stimulate the growing of the new hair. It is very gentle to the skin. I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_title: Must have in my hair care routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a part of review. I always wanted to try Dermaroller for my hair and received this at the perfect time. This is such a great tool for hair growth, I use this roller on the sparse areas followed with a hair growth serum from other brand. I have a routine where I use this every other day followed by hair oiling and hair steam. Canu2019t wait to see the results. This came in such a beautiful packaging and the roller looks luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this dermaroller, it makes the oil application so easy it helps penetrate more quickly I see a bigger difference using it. I love that it has a case and that I can buy just the head which makes more convenient

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this roller for my skinCare routine! This roller does come in a plastic case, which is perfect for traveling. I use this after my serum in a glides the serum into my pores which walks into my skin. It is very great quality and definitely worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to help stimulate growth of my hair from post partum hair loss. The concept is great but 0.25mm wasnu2019t enough to really get in my scalp. I did come across a 0.5mm dermaroller (Vitalysse brand) through an instagram ad. It worked so much better and for half the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The NEW GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller from Vegamour is a game-changer! Itu2019s easy to use and really helps boost product absorption for better results. My scalp feels healthier, and Iu2019m already noticing improvements. Grab yours from Sephora or Vegamouru2014canu2019t wait to share my progress!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Vegamour GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller is a fantastic tool for boosting hair health and promoting growth. Itu2019s easy to use and gentle on the scalp, with tiny needles that stimulate circulation and create micro-channels, helping any treatment serum absorb more effectively. Iu2019ve noticed my scalp feels invigorated after each session, and over time, my hair looks fuller and stronger. Itu2019s a great addition to any haircare routine for anyone aiming to support natural hair growth.

reviews.review_title: Must have in hair care routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this dermaroller for some time now and Iu2019ve noticed new baby hairs along my hairline! It makes my self care routine feel luxurious and the new hair growth is happening so fast! I apply the hair growth serum first and then roll over it to increase absorption. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Vegamour Dermaroller, and as a first-time user, I was pleasantly surprised that it doesnu2019t hurt at all to use! The tiny needles sounded intimidating at first, but itu2019s totally painless and easy to roll over my scalp. The design is well-made and feels sturdy, and itu2019s a satisfying addition to my routine. Iu2019m excited to see if it helps boost the effects of the vegamour advanced hair serum over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always had very thick hair and for the past few years started noticing hair thinning. I used different dermarollers, but didnu2019t like the fact that they were less sustainable, compared to Vegamouru2019s GRO+ version. I replaced it with the Vegamour GRO+ Dermaroller for about a month or more now, and I really like it: it has wider twist-on/twist-off head, that I can replace, instead of throwing out the whole dermaroller. I started noticing baby hair, that made me happy to see my hair finally growing back. My scalp feels healthier

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently added the GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller by VEGAMOUR to my routine, and Iu2019m amazed at the results Iu2019m seeing! The micro-needling design is gentle yet effective, making my scalp feel invigorated after each use. Paired with my usual hair serums, it feels like this tool has really boosted absorption and amplified my results. What I love most is how simple it is to useu2014just a few gentle rolls over my scalp, and Iu2019m done. The stainless-steel needles feel high quality, and I appreciate that itu2019s designed to be gentle enough for regular use. After a few weeks, Iu2019m noticing my hair feels thicker and healthier, and my scalp is feeling more balanced. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to elevate their hair care game!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I crave using this roller! The packaging us so pretty and there's even a case to store rhe roller into. The roller itself looks beautiful and chic with its gold color. It feels sturdy and well made. There are tiny needles in rows around the roller. I just use around my crown area where I'm noticing some thinking and it feels so good! Those tiny needles really make my scalp tingly and I can't wait to use it everyday. I think it's disloging a lot of residue from my scalp and I'm going to keep using everyday.

reviews.review_title: Love the design not the product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it last week and after trying it I was disappointed, feels more like a brush than tiny needles. It does not penetrate the scalp the point of micro needle is to create minor injuries to stimulate growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Basically, I told my dad to buy this for himself and he never thought of it mind you cause he didn't want to use it so he sent it to me and I got the package although I was not going to use it I just wanted to look inside I peel the sticker at the bottom and then I find the case wrapped in a vacuumed seal kind of deal where I can peel it from the top I finally get to the case itself and behold I open it and u2026.. itu2019s just empty absolutely nothing inside me think this was some kind of jock make I missed it in the box or I got the wrong thing no I did not I was just so surprised I thought this was an amazing brand and I did love this brand although pricy still worth it in my opinion just Iu2019m honestly hurt by this what a waste of money and a shame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this for 1 month and i can already see the results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this unknowingly it didnu2019t have a handle. I didnu2019t see anywhere it was just a head replacement. I wish it was more specific in the title. Iu2019m sure itu2019s great though. I may try to figure out how to still use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The tiny needles on the The NEW! GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller are so satisfying.  I use it with the new Gro+ serum and itu2019s helped my hair stop falling out. The dermaroller helps exfoliate and helps absorb the serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging for this was heavyweight and felt luxurious, it'd make a great gift as it feels substantial. The roller was a little heavier in the hand than I thought. The instructions make this seem a little cumbersome to use with all of the sanitation that's required, and after using I'm a little afraid of this to be honest. The concept is smart and I'm sure it works well for some people, but make sure you're really on board with the concept before purchasing would be my advice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been very intrigued by dermarollers and was excited to try one out for myself. Itu2019s a small handheld tool that works to exfoliate and stimulate the scalp. itu2019s very easy to use and feels quite pleasant actually. Afterwards I use the Gro+ hair serum. Though Iu2019ve only been using it for about a week, my scalp does feel a little different and I look forward to seeing results after a couple months of use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller has completely changed my scalp care routine! Itu2019s easy to use, with a wide head that covers more area and a twist-off design that makes it simple to replace the head each month. After just a few uses, I noticed my scalp felt smoother, and my hair care products seemed to absorb better. I love pairing it with the GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum for even better results. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This derma roller is new to me, like other users have mentioned, Iu2019ve done the face type but never with my scalp, they really made this feel so luxurious and itu2019s aesthetically beautiful! The case it comes in is almost like a sunglass case, just very elevated products done right. Using this roller I was skeptical because of the tiny sharp looking needles, and wondered if they would prick and draw blood or redness but there is nothing to worry about. Just follow the instructions given, and remember to use it clean and sanitized each time before and after use!! It really helps to use before the gro+ advanced hair serum application to boost the ability for deeper penetration and absorption. With continued use I hope to see better results in the next upcoming months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This derma roller is new to me, like other users have mentioned, Iu2019ve done the face type but never with my scalp, they really made this feel so luxurious and itu2019s aesthetically beautiful! The case it comes in is almost like a sunglass case, just very elevated products done right.  Using this roller I was skeptical because of the tiny sharp looking needles, and wondered if they would prick and draw blood or redness but there is nothing to worry about. Just follow the instructions given, and remember to use it clean and sanitized each time before and after use!! It really helps to use before the gro+ advanced hair serum application to boost the ability for deeper penetration and absorption. With continued use I hope to see better results in the next upcoming months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve done derma rolling on my body to help fade stretch marks and scars, and it worked amazingly. Dermarolling on the scalp for hair growth is new to me, but I wouldnu2019t trust any other brand than Vegamour! This product comes in a beautiful case for storage, and the handle has a nice weight to it, which makes it easy to use. I apply it to a clean scalp at night right before using the GRO+ serum. I didnu2019t experience any stinging or pain during the rolling or after applying the serum. While itu2019s hard to determine if this boosts results without the serum, Iu2019m excited to see its long-term effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: was a little bit scared to try the Vegamour Gro + Advanced Dermaroller at first for fear that it might be painful.  It actually wasnu2019t bad at all, it was slightly uncomfortable in the beginning but I quickly got used to it.  The dermaroller is extremely effective with gentle exfoliation, transforms the scalp, removes dead skin cells and product buildup.  Itu2019s also great for getting your scalp ready for hair growth serums!  Itu2019s safe, effective and my scalp is much cleaner.  I havenu2019t used the dermaroller long enough to see any real results but I will definitely continue using it.  The dermaroller is incredibly easy to clean and has a beautiful case for storage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used dermarollers before on the face but this is the first time Iu2019ve done it on my hair & so far I am loving the new haircare routine! Honestly I was scared at first but Iu2019m happy to say it didnu2019t hurt. I love using this before applying the hair serum. My hair feels really nice with the whole routine from shampoo to conditioner, then the Derma roller to the hair serum. I am slowly seeing some difference but Iu2019ll have to give an update after a month or so!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This dermaroller is pretty! I has a case to store it, and it's very light! I feels safe and not painful to roll on my scalp. I use it with hair growth serum which can help infuse the serum better. It dried fast when cleaning and wont rust like other brand. Overall I like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gro+ advanced dermaroller has become my new haircare night routine! I was a bit scared to use it the first time since I thought it was going to hurt, but the needles are tiny so you can barely feel them! I use it before I apply the oil from the same gro+ advanced series and I am excited to see the proper result in a couple months!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This dermaroller is soo good!! I pair it with the hair growth oil they gave and it feels soo good! Still havent seen major differences but I like the feeling and I have a good feeling its gonna work! It doesnt hurt when I roll it on my scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This dermaroller is just the tool I needed to elevate my hair growth game! It feels really nice on the scalp & has become a staple in my hair care routine before bed. I like to apply my scalp serum and then use the dermaroller to really make sure the penetrate my scalp and allow the serum to soak in and further stimulate hair growth. Iu2019m excited to see long term results with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Gro+Advanced Dermaroller contains small needles.  Apply on clean scalp, rolling it horizontally and vertically it gives off slight pinching sensations.  While it is too soon to see results with about two weeks trial, I feel it helps simulate circulation in my scalp.  With the use of hair serum, I hope Iu2019ll see difference in hair growth overtime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a firm believer of microneedling specially in skincare. I never thought that I could do it on my scalp. When I saw that Vegamour came out with a dermaroller specifically for the scalp I was ready to get my hands on it as soon as possible! I suffer from hair loss due to many factors. I've tried many things but my hair still falls off and it's so fine and thin that it's embarrassing for me when my family finds my hairs everywhere! I truly believe that microneedling has helped my serums deeply penetrate the scalp to ensure they work. It has also helped with circulation. I focus on my hairline and top back of the head and I can see my baby hairs are slowly growing back! I definitely recommend this dermaroller and microneedling in general!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a little nervous to use it at first, but it is not as scary as it may look! Itu2019s easy to use and doesnu2019t hurt at all. I use it to help stimulate the scalp while helping to absorb the oil and serum that I use nightly. Iu2019m impressed at the ease of use, and it is a must to sanitize afterwards, just to ensure it is clean and disinfected. Excited to continue using in my regrowth routine.

I absolutely love Vegamour. their products are always luxurious and definitely give that high class feel however the case that the derma roller comes in is a little hard it snaps pretty loud, but it makes sense that they made a derma roller and I absolutely love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never used a derma roller on my scalp before so I was so excited to try this. I lightly roll my scalp on freshly washed hair. I do it on damp hair, Iu2019m not sure if thatu2019s the right way but thatu2019s what I do. It doesnu2019t hurt and feels nice. Looking forward to results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: was so excited but scared to try this product at first out but it was super easy if you follow the directions. I really do feel like this opened the follicles and help me keep my scalp clean, removing dead skin cells and product buildup without  hurting, I like the design and I think is a good product to include it in your hair routine

reviews.review_text: Used this dermaroller for a week and I noticed that my hair is shedding less now. I had to get used to it in the beginning but now I am totally fine with it. I would recommend this little device for men or women, especially if you use any kind of serum for growing your hair, it will help with absorption

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this dermaroller. I use it before putting any type of serum on my scalp. Itu2019s very gentle and doesnu2019t hurt at all, but still very effective. Overall I would definitely recommend using it!

I love that it has replaceable heads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of this brand already and loved adding this dermaroller to my routine. I typically do it once a day and I feel like it helps stimulate my scalp. I used it during the night on clean hair with the grow serum but I think it would still be great at any point of the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by how easy the GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller was to incorporate into my hair routine! I prefer to use this nightly before applying a dropper full of the GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum. There is no discomfort and the dermaroller is super easy to spritz with rubbing alcohol to keep clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have received Vegamour's NEW! GRO+ Advance Dermaroller in exchange for my review.  The titanium needles are painless and help to absorb the Vegamour Gro+Advanced Hair serum that I apply first before using the dermaroller at the thinning areas of my hair,  I takes a few minutes to do this night and I have seen positive results with increase in about 30% hair growth.  I highly recommend this product for thinning hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice product.  Iu2019ve had other derma rollers in the past, but this one is the best quality Iu2019ve seen.  Itu2019s sleek and feels weighted which makes the experience feel very lux.  It doesnu2019t hurt, and Iu2019m hopeful it will help aid in new hair growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The GRO+ Advanced Scalp Dermaroller, with 0.25 mm needles, is a great addition to any hair care routine. It's designed to improve scalp health and promote hair growth by creating tiny microchannels in the scalp. This process enhances the absorption of topical treatments, making them more effective. The roller also stimulates blood circulation, which can help nourish hair follicles. Its gentle design makes it suitable for regular use, and users often find it a useful tool for maximizing the benefits of their hair care products. Whether you're looking to support hair growth or improve scalp health, this dermaroller offers a practical solution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had always been incredibly curious to try a product like this out, but to be honest, I was also very scared because of the end of the day he needles nonetheless, but after giving this a try, Iu2019m super super happy. I can definitely see my hair products working 1000 times better than they did before, so this is a 10 out of 10 recommended product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was actually so afraid to try this because I wasnu2019t sure if it would hurt or not. I have a few sections of sparse hair on my head and Iu2019m hoping this could be the answer to help hair grow again. So my curiosity got the best of me and I tried it. You roll 5 times vertically and 5 times horizontally. Just be sure to work in small sections because you donu2019t want to pull hair out. Itu2019s still early to see if it works or not but Iu2019m really excited to see results. I do this once or twice a week. And by the way- it doesnu2019t hurt at all!

reviews.review_title: New staple! Scalp tingles with excitement
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a high quality dermaroller! I have been using a dermastamp on my scalp prior to this. I like the roller so much more! I can feel the area I roll over tingle in such a good way after rolling. I like to use my scalp serum after rolling. I like my scalp to be as clean as possible prior to use. So I use right after the shower, then scalp serum, then the rest of my products. This dermaroller will be a new staple in my hair care routine!

reviews.review_text: Excited to use this trusted device, since there are so many on the market that are quite misleading and untrustworthy. Always use alcohol on it prior using it and after. Is very gentle and gives almost a scalp massage with minimal visible signs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t think I needed to have another beauty tool in my life until I tried this one. I feel like it really does help stimulate hair growth and helps to push the product down deeper so that itu2019s more useful

It is good quality and the gold is a nice touch, but for the price and the purpose, there are definitely other budget friendly alternatives. The replaceable head is nice, but wished we get at least one replacement for the price of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Combination skin

I love the way it helps with the absorption of serums. Iu2019ve noticed a lot less hair shedding and Iu2019m excited to see more results! Highly recommended!

I have baby hairs on my forehead that I want to grow out for a fuller look and Iu2019m already seeing the thickness and growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

I have tried Vegamour products before and have not been disappointed so I absolutely cannot wait to see results from using this consistently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: This is a very gentle derma roller. I am glad to try it from my favorite brand. If you are new to this then itu2019s a good gentle one. You have to still be careful and follow all precautions and keep it sanitized. This can help with hair growth and shedding as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller has been a game-changer for my skincare routine. The 0.3mm needles effectively enhance collagen production and increase the absorption of my serums. After just a few sessions, my skin feels rejuvenated and glows. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My Experience with the GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller & Hair Serum by Vegamour. Iu2019ve been using the GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller and Air Serum from Vegamour for two weeks, and I'm loving the results! Effectiveness: I can honestly say my scalp feels healthier, and my hair looks thicker and more vibrant. The dermaroller really helps the serum sink in, making everything work better together. Packaging: The products come in such sleek packaging that looks great on my shelf. Plus, they're super easy to take with me when I travel. Safety: At first, I was a bit nervous about using a dermaroller on my scalp, but the needles are super high-quality and safe. Just go easy and follow the instructions, and youu2019ll be fine! How to Clean: After each use, I rinse the dermaroller with warm water and disinfect it with rubbing alcohol to keep it clean and ready for next time. Overall, this combo has become a key part of my hair care routine. If youu2019re looking to improve your scalp health and give your hair a boost, I totally recommend giving these products a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This roller is pretty cool! Iu2019ve been using it since I received it and itu2019s very pretty and works very well. Iu2019ve been using ir with the serum and I can wait to see results. I also love that it has a carrying case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to try this Dermaroller for my scalp right now. In the past I dyed my hair which caused hair loss, flaking and a sensitive scalp, but this dermaroller did the impossible, right now my hair has stopped falling out, the flaking has decreased, I am amazed at how well it works, Use it three times to four times a week at night before going to sleep. It comes in a case for storage and is easy to clean.

reviews.review_text: I've used dermarollers on my face but never on my hair. I've also used Vegamour serum in the past and loved the results. Combining the two? BRILLIANT. As others mentioned, the case is stunning and high-end looking as is the product. The packaging makes it great to travel and the product itself is super easy to use and highly effective when combined with the serum. Hello new baby hairs!

reviews.review_text: I am so happy that I get to try a dermaroller for the first time! this derma roller is so nice to help spread the serum across my scalp with gentle pressure. Super easy to use, just another way of pampering yourself with this tool.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so impressed with this product! I've been curious about dermarollers for the scalp for a while now because I have thin hair and I'm eager to see if this can help improve my hair density. The dermaroller comes in a sturdy case that keeps it safe and secure. When I used it, I experienced minimal irritation, and it was incredibly easy to use. reviews.review_text: I had never used a dermaroller before, and my first experience with Vegamour has been amazing. Additionally, I incorporated the shampoo and hair growth serum from this brand, and after just four weeks, I can already see results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller is very easy to use and looks so elegant with its sleek and metallic design. I think using this product has helped my scalp absorb my haircare products so my hair has been looking better!

reviews.review_title: Canu2019t wait to see more hair growth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been noticing hair thinning and been using different dermaroller. I replaced it with the Vegamour GRO+ Dermaroller for about a week now, and Iu2019m really excited and hopeful to see the results with more consistent use. I was a bit skeptical about microneedling at home, but the process is surprisingly easy and painless. The dermaroller itself feels sturdy and well-made. Iu2019ve noticed that my scalp feels healthier, and thereu2019s definitely some new growth starting to come in. Itu2019s too soon to say if it will make a huge difference long-term, but so far, Iu2019m happy with the progress. If youu2019re looking to boost your hair growth routine, this is definitely worth a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like that it stimulates hair growth! I had really bad hair loss after an illness. I have to be consistent with it to see baby hairs grow especially because my hair doesn't grow that fast. I use it once a week and apply serum after. It doesn't hurt.

reviews.review_text: What a great product! I have been intrigued by dermarollers for the scalp for quite a while now as I definitely have thin hair and really want to see if I can improve my hair density. reviews.review_text: This GRO+ advanced, derma, roller hair serum. Kit is amazing. It really did help stimulate my hair growth. It is easy to use. You just have to be very consistent I will be purchasing more to help my husband now with his hair growth. We are happy with the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

The dermaroller comes with a nice case, which is very convenient for storage. Using this tool in conjunction with the serum, I have noticed great results in my hair density. Highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This dermaroller is great quality and comes with a  nice and convenient case to store it. It's perfect for anyone who wants to increase hair growth but is new to dermarolling like me! I'm hoping to see some results with consistent use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The stuff is absolutely amazing!! I was able to try this three months now and have noticed a significant amount of growth and new growth. My hair around my part is much fuller than before. Also, the sides edges of my hair have grown in thicker along with new growth behind my head to where you canu2019t see through my hair anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this dermaroller for my scalp, to stimulate hair growth. Sometimes it does happen that my hair gets tangled in the roller (even when wet). After dermarolling my scalp I use GA hair growth serum. My hair is definitely shedding less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I started experiencing some mystery hair thinning a little over a year ago. It turns out it was from a long term iron deficiency, that has since been corrected, but my hair hasnu2019t been as quick to recover as I would have hoped. Vegamour has been such a huge help through all of the sadness and frustration that goes along with thinning hair. Every one of their products Iu2019ve tried has been fantastic quality and theyu2019ve never been too heavy for my fine hair, which is amazing. So I when I found out they were coming out with a dermaroller I knew immediately that it was something that I needed to try. The tool itself feels substantial and very well made in your hand. And I love how wide the roller is - it requires less passes, so I donu2019t feel like Iu2019m rushing towards the end and can be as careful and deliberate as I would like to be the whole way through without getting bored or my arms getting tired. It doesnu2019t hurt or cause any discomfort and my scalp feels really healthy since Iu2019ve added it to my routine. Iu2019m honestly thrilled with it and canu2019t wait to see what results Iu2019m able to see with long term use. If youu2019re on the fence, go for it!

reviews.review_title: Amazing for hair loss or thinning hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect tool for stimulating your scalp and getting new follicles to grow. I chose to try this one after I accidentally bought one that was too big so the fact it is 0.25 diameter works perfectly with my scalp. It is so beautiful right out of the packaging and the quality of the derma roller is top tier! If you are looking to try dermarolling for the first time or looking to switch your current one this is a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just started using this dermaroller, and I havenu2019t tried one before but Iu2019ve heard of so many great benefits, such as allowing product to really absorb into your hair and help with growth, and regrowth! Canu2019t wait to see how it turns out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have struggled with hair loss and thinning hair for some time, so I was excited to try this product.  I must say, I have been pleasantly surprised by the results. After using the dermaroller on my scalp, I have noticed thatf my hair feels thicker and looks healthier. I also feel like my scalp is less itchy and irritated, which has been a common issue for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair has been thinning a lot lately and this is the best for hair and scalp care. It helps me make sure that the hair serum absorbs into my scalp for better results. I use try to use it daily once a day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by vegamour, I received the Vegamour serum and Dermaroller, have been consistently using it for the past 3 months. I try incorporating it in my night-time routine, as the serum is water-like and I dont want to mess up my hair first thing in the morning. Using gentle pressure, roll the Dermaroller ensuring my thinning areas of concern are taking care of. Then I take a couple of drops of the serum, in my palm, and apply it in areas of concern. I follow this by sanitizing the Dermaroller. I wouldnu2019t say I have noticed significant growth in the area, but my hair just feels thicker and my scalp feels rejuvenated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a cool tool. Itu2019s such a great way to massage your scalp, which is so important for hair growth. It can be used on dry or damp hair. Itu2019s also a great way to massage that product in to your scalp. Itu2019s small and compact so you can travel with it as well!

reviews.review_text: This is a game changer for my scalp health. Easy to use and gentle, it promotes hair growth and enhances absorption of topical treatments, a must have for anyone looking to improve hair density and scalp condition

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok this is the best thing for your hair and scalp! Helps so much to get the products actually absorbed into your scalp so they work. It doesnu2019t hurt at all either. I use it once a week to help me get the full potential of all my products

reviews.review_text: Letu2019s talk about the new products and their packaging from Vegamour. First of all the packaging is so luxurious it actually looks like sunglasses box/cover. I have tried dermarollers in the past and they have plastic cheap handles which put pressure on the skin/scalp this doesnu2019t itu2019s made really good and feels so lux. The needles are fine and doesnu2019t hurt much like traditional rollers. It comes  sanitized so when you first open it. Itu2019s sealed in a sanitized pouch. Before using always sanitize it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like to use this dermatoller after I wash my hair and before I apply the hair serum. My hair has been thinning a lot lately and I am in real need of something to make it look healthier. This has been a real game changer.

reviews.review_text: This scalp dermaroller looks and feels high quality. It comes in a nice case, is sleek looking, and feels comfortable when using. The needles are small enough that they donu2019t hurt or cause any irritation. It rolls smoothly and does not get tangled in my hair. I have been using it paired with the serum and it seems to help prepare my scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This dermaroller is the last step in Vegamour's Gro+ system, and it is the perfect last step. It doesnt irritate, in fact, it feels quite good to gently roll over the scalp. It increases blood flow, and in turn, a healthier scalp! Definitely a must have last step, do NOT skip out on it!!

reviews.review_title: Healthy strands from the inside out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have hair loss and I'm very excited about having this treatment with  Dermaroller GRO+ Advanced by Vegamour. The serum is amazing for my hair so this combination will help me a lot with hair loss and I want my hair to grow more. This tool gently exfoliates the scalp to prepare it for the hair serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited to try this GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller from Vegamour. I absolutely love their hair serum and so excited for the benefits. This tool gently exfoliates the scalp to prepare for their hair serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This combo really works for me. I have a crusty patch on my scalp for years. Started applying this product once a day and scalp was completely clear in a month. It works. Soothes my itchy scalp! Feels like velvet going on. No mess in the hair. My hair looks healthier and stronger. So happy with those products, highly recommend

reviews.review_title: Great to help stimulate your hair follicles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love dermarollers! Recently I have noticed that I have been losing a lot of hair on the temples of my head where my hair is parted and decided to start dermarolling again. This one in particular is such a greatly crafted one. I just roll it in one direction 2-4 times horizontally and vertically to stimulate the follicles and prepare for the advanced serum. The derma roller seriously has been helping because I've seen so many little baby hairs sprout!

reviews.review_title: The wide head makes the job faster
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the nicest dermaroller Iu2019ve ever owned and I own at least 10. It feels substantial in your hand but also still lightweight. The wide head makes it easy to get a full application in less time. It doesnu2019t hurt as the needles are pretty short and you only need a light pressure to get the job done effectively. It took about half the time with this than I usually spend rolling my scalp because of the large head. Which means my hands are less tired when Iu2019m done. I dermaroll my scalp religiously because of all the things Iu2019ve tried for hair loss and regrowth I feel itu2019s produced the best effect. I love that this comes in a beautiful case that looks like itu2019s for expensive sunglasses unlike most scalp rollers that come in the standard plastic case. The head is replaceable which is also a huge plus. It rolls seamlessly and smoothly. If you do it correctly it wonu2019t pull out hair. It has a high end cost but it performs and looks high end. It also doesnu2019t squeak like some Iu2019ve tried. I think itu2019s a luxe tool that performs the job in less time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this tool!!! Feels really good on the skin and i canu2019t wait to see the long term effects!! Its really good for anti aging which is what i am going to start needing in my 30s! Highly recommend this tool

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the size of this roller! I love how much bigger it is compared to your normal size smaller ones. It comes with a fancy case holder similar to an eyeglasses case. The needles should help stimulate the growth also. I would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m about eight months postpartum and I have been struggling with postpartum hair loss. Using a dermaroller on my scalp is very intriguing. Iu2019ve used this along with the serum and so far itu2019s an easy process.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a dermaroller and hair growth serum set. For some reason, I only received the head of the roller and not the handle so I could not try it out and can not comment on it. The serum absorbs nicely into the hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had higher expectations for this set and I was not impressed . The serum is small first of all , barely a month supply . The dermroller is nothing new many brands have a better option . I am not impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using a derma roller on my hair for quite a while and it absolutely makes all the difference ! Paired with their hair serum you will see so many new hairs coming it ! I had bald spots on the sides and now itu2019s filled with little hairs ! This derma roller will make all the difference and it doesnu2019t hurt

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This look so lux I canu2019t tell you how much I am happy to own this derma roller! Itu2019s a masterpiece in my vanity. Beyond that itu2019s greatest tool to help grow healthy and thick hair.  Just combine it with vegamour serum and youu2019ll see results in 2 weeks.  Vegamour youu2019ve created lux hair are. Thank you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serums made quite a difference in my hair growth only after a couple uses. I love the roller because it truly helps get the serum into my scalp and massage it in. Theyu2019re a great combo to use together

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this dermaroller and it feels so great on my scalp when I use it. It took a second to get used to the first time I used it but I know that the little pokes were stimulating new growth and that makes me really happy. The packaging is really Luxe and beautiful. This is a must have for anyone experiencing hair loss or thinning to help stimulate more growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been so excited to try a derma roller and this did not disappoint.  This has been a fun experience a couple days in with the growth serum so I w ill have to check back in once I see results. But the quality is great and it has been a great experience so far

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: only used this a few times but so far so good. ive read that dermarolling on the scalp will stimulate growth over time. very easy to use and clean. i also like that you can replace the pins roller for sanitary reasons. doesnt hurt and excited to see my results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great tool to elevate your hair care routine and boost hair growth! Itu2019s well made, durable, easy to use and looks absolutely stunning too. Iu2019ve tried multiple dermarollers for my scalp and this one is my favorite so far. It feels gentle and seems to really work. I also love that this roller comes with a pretty case to store it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this dermaroller is heavy and has a luxurious feel. iu2019ve just started using it to combat thinning hair and enjoy the extra step in my routine! it doesnu2019t hurt and i love knowing that my hair growth serums are more deeply penetrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great dermaroller. It works great with my hair serums and allows them to penetrate the scalp better for better results. It's super wide so you get more surface area when rolling and is high quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the luxe Dermaroller for my scalp, and I'm impressed! This tool gently exfoliates the scalp, perfectly prepping it for Vegamour's GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum. The wide head covers a lot of area quickly, making the process efficient. The twist-on, twist-off design is super convenient, and the included protective carry case is a nice touch. It's great that replacement heads are easy to swap out monthly for optimal results. Overall, a fantastic addition to my hair care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This tool does a great job exfoliating my scalp. The packaging is super luxurious and itu2019s easy to use. It leaves my scalp feeling refreshed, and it makes it easier for the product to soak into my scalp. Canu2019t wait to keep using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamoru2019s gro+ advanced dermaroller has been a great addition to my hair care routine. This tool feels very luxurious and I also love that the head is replaceable without having to be an entire new tool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The new GRO+ Advanced Dermaroller is so helpful in my hair growth journey! Iu2019ll be honest at first it was a little uncomfortable, but after using it for a week you get the hang of it. It just helped your scalp to absorb the product so much better and I truly feel like itu2019s helped my hair growth a lot. Also recommend cleansing it every day after you just so you donu2019t grow any bacteria on It!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tool is the perfect addition to use with the hair growth serum! It exfoliates the scalp so well and makes me feel like I am getting the most out of the product! I love the case it comes with and I cannot wait to see continued growth with my hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This dermaroller really helps improve problems on my dry scalp hair. I see many changes.  I love how it lightly exfoliates the scalp on my hair very soft and smooth. I also apply the GRO+ Advanced Hair Serum immediately after So it faster the results.
